ISSUE.TITLE: Add an event invoked when the application starts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes we need to perform some actions when the application starts, for example, install and update plugins, start the task scheduler, etc. At moment we perform all this in the core, but this is not a very flexible solution. We could add an event on startup that can be handled anywhere including in plugins. Make sure the dependency injection will work correctly in this case. See PR: S
